response.name: ListOrganizations

request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /trial_balance_drillable

**Description**: Returns ListLookupItems

**Full** **URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/trial-balance-drillable/budgets

**Method**: GET

**Application Example:**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/trial-balance-drillable/budgets' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU'

 ```

**Answer Example:**

``` json
{
    "record_count": "1",
    "records": [
        {
            "id": 100,
            "table_name": "GL_Budget",
            "values": {
                "KeyColumn": 100,
                "DisplayColumn": "Target Budget",
                "UUID": "5bbb1369-b26a-4e18-8a1e-e8df04f01c95"
            },
            "is_active": true
        }
    ],
    "next_page_token": ""
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | Date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

response.name: ListAccoutingKeys

request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /trial_balance_drillable

**Description**: Returns ListLookupItems

**Full** **URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/trial-balance-drillable/accouting-fact-summary/{organization_id}/{period_id}/{report_cube_id}

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params):**

- organization_id (Int32, Mandatory)
- period_id (Int32, Mandatory)
- report_cube_id (Int32, Mandatory)
    

**Application Example:**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/trial-balance-drillable/accouting-fact-summary?organization_id=102&period_id=136&report_cube_id=102' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ2IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZXNfTVgiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA2Mjg3ODAsImV4cCI6MTcxMDcxNTE4MH0.8Sg48hnxmTbqs7nG_JoafC7AwXbHX3jWAPLPJ0Qo7VU'

 ```

**Answer Example:**

``` json
{
    "record_count": "1",
    "records": [
        {
            "id": 631,
            "value": "32900_",
            "name": ">>> Prior Year Earnings",
            "user_list_id": 0,
            "user_list_name": "",
            "period_actual_amount": "0",
            "period_budget_amount": "0",
            "period_variance_amount": "0",
            "ytd_actual_amount": "0",
            "ytd_budget_amount": "0",
            "variance_amount": "0"
        }
    ],
    "next_page_token": ""
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the period id does not correspond to any of the records
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | Date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |
